SK AI DC

big task for for uzbekistan

make thing to pull information

TRAINING

Your own project finance training

Keep on with decolonising economics
D-Econ

- Finish WCIB Joining


EVENTS
- Find some events to attend


JESS
Meet with her and Nav Friday
Organise/solidify research


10112025mid-week planner
AI Data Centre 
--

-- i have a briefing on the market broadly and an example transaction
-- but need more information on
-- secondary market renewables and
-- regional policy differences (done a bit on Texas)

-- hear from s&p or just contact any other
Aus/E.Europe Renewables
--

message nav  for talk




WEBSITE
----------------------------------------------------------------

Deals form/section to include equity as well

super-admin status created for cam

super admin pages collected

pdf generation removed

excel com removed

ability to update market data removed

jsons and mrket intelligence frozen in time

strategies section using this new COMBINED JSON feature

Replace the picture of Yerevan

introduction of settings page with full functionality

start bringing the playbookinto super admin

Link 'countries' across the board. Countries as an investment preference and ability to add multiple (think about csv, excel downloads)

new style across the board

changed the workstreams and calendar to be more effective

------------------------------------------------------------
FIGURE OUT HOW TO EFFECTIVELY USE/UTILISE AGENTS

link the tasks on calendar to actual tasks from the workstream (don't back-do this, create ability to).
can we create a page
--- this page should also have workstreams in it
update the home page of the super admin settings

Fix work streams and improve
Change assigned on calendar to abroad
New page for 
Create homepage for super-admin

init

STYLE
Use EBRD page as inspiration for style
- Is there a way to change an automatic (react) format so i can change all thigs in the website 

switch 'agents and 'transaction agents' as terminology in all cases

alphabetical ordering (in meeting notes &...)

new home page and new 'this website' page

country reports-markets-dashboards ordering

we shouldn't have the following
"Excel COM Operations
Disabled
Windows-only Excel macro execution via COM interface
Impact: Enables /api/excel/refresh endpoint for macro execution " in the page


NEW SECTIONS
Could we create a new section - DC Financing Paramaters and Research

We could have a possible projects tab. Or sector-specific information

Create a new page for established, created strategies

SECTION SPECIFIC
Blank features and reading excel removed. Ready for API inputs instead. Headers across all except interest rates saying not updated. File explaining this is on purpose

A blank feature for yield curves. this feature pops up in both the market intelligence section and as a tab in the countries section

Meeting history to meeting notes page for the subsection ALL

mynotess- i need to be able to save these and pin some to the top

UPLOADING
Remove the market intelligence section 
- Or replace with queries from old market dashboard paper with this

Make note/noi

Can stay in GitHub? 

Attempt loading backend. [Weekend maybe]

Irrelevant maybeto delete
- pdf generation script
- anything market intel
- all etl scraping file

DELETE ALL ETL


UNFOLDERED
full understanding before i start gitting
Learn to push to GitHub and what this means

upload the playbook as a section of the website
